casebody.data:
PAUL CHRISTOPHER v. STATE OF MARYLAND FRED JONES v. STATE OF MARYLAND [Nos. 18, 19,

April Term, 1938.]

Decided April 22nd, 1938.

The causes were submitted on briefs to Bone, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

A. Stengle Marine and LeRoy L. Wallace, for the appellants. Herbert R. O’Conor, Attorney General, Hilary W. *695Gans, Deputy Attorney General, and J. Gorman Hill, State’s Attorney for Dorchester County, for the State.

The opinion was delivered

per Curiam.
